reviewText: My thoughts on this are from the perspective of someone who has watched the first season of "Transitions" which sets up this film. I thought it was well put together and that the introduction of a new character and the build to the expected second season well executed. The production values are impressive given its low-budget status and the shots were clearly well planned. I wish the creators well and hope they create more content.

Be careful, this isn't a full movie. It runs only 30mins

Try the trailer on youtube to see how boring it is. Nothing interesting happens.
